009
010package imagingbook.common.geometry.mappings.linear;
011
012import imagingbook.common.geometry.basic.Pnt2d;
013
014/**
015 * <p>
016 * This class represents a pure 2D translation (as a special case of affine
017 * transformation). Instances are immutable and it can be assumed that every
018 * instance of this class is indeed a translation. See Secs. 21.1.3 and 21.3.1
019 * of [1] for details.
020 * </p>
021 * <p>
022 * [1] W. Burger, M.J. Burge, <em>Digital Image Processing &ndash; An
023 * Algorithmic Introduction</em>, 3rd ed, Springer (2022).
024 * </p>
025 * 
026 * @author WB
027 */
028public class Translation2D extends AffineMapping2D {
029
030        /**
031         * Constructor. Creates a new 2D translation mapping.
032         * @param tx translation in x
033         * @param ty translation in y
034         */
035        public Translation2D(double tx, double ty) {
036                super(1, 0, tx, 0, 1, ty);
037        }
038        
039        /**
040         * Constructor. Creates a new 2D translation mapping.
041         * @param txy translation in x/y (2-element array)
042         */
043        public Translation2D(double[] txy) {
044                this(txy[0], txy[1]);
045        }
046
047        /** 
048         * Constructor. Creates a new translation instance from a given translation.
049         * @param m a 2D translation mapping
050         */
051        public Translation2D(Translation2D m) {
052                this(m.a02, m.a12);
053        }
054        
055        /**
056         * Creates a new translation that maps between the first point
057         * to the second point specified.
058         * @param p the first point 
059         * @param q the second point
060         * @return a new translation instance
061         */
062        public static Translation2D fromPoints(Pnt2d p, Pnt2d q) {
063                return new Translation2D(q.getX() - p.getX(), q.getY() - p.getY());
064        }
065        
066        // ----------------------------------------------------------
067
068        @Override
069        public Translation2D duplicate() {
070                return new Translation2D(this);
071        }
072        
073        /**
074         * Concatenates this translation A with another translation B and returns
075         * a new translation C, such that C(x) = B(A(x)).
076         * @param B the second translation
077         * @return the concatenated translations
078         */
079        public Translation2D concat(Translation2D B) {
080                return new Translation2D(this.a02 + B.a02, this.a12 + B.a12);
081        }
082        
083        @Override
084        public Translation2D getInverse() {
085                return new Translation2D(-this.a02, -this.a12);
086        }
087
088        @Override
089        public double[][] getJacobian(Pnt2d xy) {
090                // this mapping has a constant Jacobian (indep. of xy)
091                return new double[][]
092                        {{1, 0},
093                         {0, 1}};
094        }
095}
